4:
URL box in web browsers has auto-complete function that causes issues when typing abbreviations.

Workaround:
    1. Create a group which contains URLs
    2. Set a hotkey for that group and use the hotkey in URL box.

There are other ways to insert snippets without typing abbreviations:
    • Search hotkey
    • Snippet menu hotkey
    • Notify icon menu
    • Floating menu
10: Issues with URL box in web browsers
